title: The Secret Sauce
description: In this chapter, we'll share some lesser-known strategies and tips for making a lasting impact in the open source community. We'll discuss how to focus on open issues, gain traction in your contributions, and develop your open source resume using OpenSauced.

frontMatter.title: The Secret Sauce
keywords: how to make a lasting impact in open source
building open source resume with OpenSauced
building a strong open source profile
becoming a valuable contributor to open source projects
tips for building a strong reputation in open source

previous.title: How to Contribute to Open Source
